name: World of Warships: Legends—Baltic Gunboat
description:
Add a nimble Russian destroyer to your collection! Storozhevoi is a fast and agile gunboat—a perfect starter for your fleet!

Comes with: - Tier II destroyer Storozhevoi - 7 days of Premium Account - 150,000 credits - 30x Type 1 camouflages - 30x Type 2 camouflages - 30x rare boosters of each type - 37,000 Commander XP

If you already have Storozhevoi in your Port, you'll receive compensation in the form of 1,500,000 credits. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc., are only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
